text: Ani jevha imana rakhanaryansi bhetatata, tevha apana imanadharaka asalyace jahira karatata ani apasata gathi bheti karatata, tevha mhanatata ki musalamanampaveto tya gosti ka pohacavita, jya allahane tumhala sikavilya aheta. Kaya he nahi janata ki ya gosti tara allahacya samora tumacyavara tyanca purava tharatila
